querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo,  A.APP_ID AS AppId, AC.CUST_NAME AS CustName, A.TENOR AS Tenor, A.CURR_CODE AS CurrCode, A.NUM_OF_ASSET AS NumOfAsset, A.ORI_OFFICE_NAME AS OfficeName, A.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, A.PROD_OFFERING_CODE AS ProdOfferingCode, A.PROD_OFFERING_VERSION AS ProdOfferingVersion, A.MR_ORDER_INFO_CODE AS MrOrderInfoCode, A.LEAD_ID AS LeadId, L.LEAD_NO AS LeadNo, StatDescr.DESCR AS Stat, ISNULL(AgrCurStepDescr.DESCR, CurrStepDescr.DESCR) AS CurrStep, ISNULL(AgrLastStepDescr.DESCR, LastStepDescr.DESCR) AS LastStep
querystring.from: FROM APP A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.AGRMNT B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID LEFT JOIN APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LEAD L ON L.LEAD_ID = A.LEAD_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS StatDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_STAT = StatDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND StatDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS CurrStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_CURR_STEP = CurrStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND CurrStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS LastStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_LAST_STEP = LastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND LastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS AgrCurStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.AGRMNT_CURR_STEP = AgrCurStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND AgrCurStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS AgrLastStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.AGRMNT_LAST_STEP = AgrLastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND AgrLastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC'
